original_title: The Regional Conference of the Charted Accountants of Sri Lanka was held on Thurday (27) in Jaffna.
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) : The Jaffna Regional Conference is the first conference organized in Jaffna by the Charted Accountants of Sri Lanka.

The conference saw the attendance of Northern Province Governor Jeevan Thiyagaraja, Vice Chancellor University of jaffna Professor Sri Sathgunaraja, Chariman of CA Sri Lanka Sanjay Bandara and the Vice President of CA Sri Lanka Kesana Kuruppu.
The conference's objectives was to exert relevant and required social & economic impact and the involvement stakeholders with institutes activities from across the Jaffna region.
The Regional Conference of the Charted Accountants of Sri Lanka was held on Thurday (27) in Jaffna.
